properties.displayName: Diskshadow Script Mode - Uncommon Script Extension Execution
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ((ProcessCommandLine contains "-s " or ProcessCommandLine contains "/s ") and (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "diskshadow.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\diskshadow.exe")) and (not(ProcessCommandLine contains ".txt"))

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects execution of "Diskshadow.exe" in script mode to execute an script with a potentially uncommon extension.
Initial baselining of the allowed extension list is required.
